caption:
What’s inside our new vitamin C serum, C-Luma?

Sodium ascorbyl phosphate (9.0%) helps brighten, reduces blemishes, and improves elasticity, fine lines, and wrinkles.

Ascorbyl glucoside (1.0%) protects against UV damage and free radicals and helps improve the appearance of hyperpigmentation.

A triple-antioxidant brightening complex (phloretin, glutathione, and diglucosyl gallic acid) has been known to help reduce hyperpigmentation.

Shop now at drunkelephant.com, @sephora, and @ultabeauty.
